mph.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: used to describe the speed of something, especially a vehicle or the wind
mph.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: high winds of up to 140 mph
mph.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: miles per hour; used to describe the speed of a vehicle
mph.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: The car reaches 60 mph in eight seconds.
